text: To test the robustness of our methods on a given RNA sequence , we need to provide partial information about the true pseudoknot - free structure as input structure for that sequence . To obtain the true pseudoknot - free http : / / www . biomedcentral . com / 1471 - 2105 / 15 / 147 This table provides the names , description and values of the energy parameters and functions that we used in our methods . The names and definitions are the same as in our original HFold [ 48 ] , and the values were updated based on the work of Andronescu et al . [ 36 ] . These parameters were derived for a temperature of 37 ° C and 1 M salt concentration .
